title: One for all - not as fun as other game modes
body:
Haven't really enjoyed one for all this time around. very lucky for more than a couple on the team to be happy with the pick and for those that aren't it is like a very long and boring aram.

I think it is better for teams who are happy to agree the pick before hand. For solo Q a couple are happy and the rest are bored.

Tahm Kench - my team mates were wetting themselves with delight at this pick but I was super bored for 40 mins. Will probably avoid this game mode for the time being I think

replies.body: How is tahm kench boring? I mained tahm supp bot since release until now... Plus, I played him in one for all yesterday and it was fun! I think your just being harsh on the champ itself...
He could be loads of fun in a normal match but in one for all he was boring and frustrating.

If you like licking dudes and having them in your mouth the tahm is the champ for you. 

But he is a utility tank support who doesnt scale that incredibly with ap and as far as i could  see has no abilities which scale with ad. 40 minutes of eating lee sin, spitting him out and then dying to a champ designed to kill is not my idea of fun.
How would 5 Tahm Kench be boring? Just get a friend on skype and watch the madness unfold
Tahm Kench = perma ban for me haha
In this mode he is sooooo boring.  Has turned me off one for all.
